title: Indonesia: Bintan Island Banyan Tree Private Pool Villas with Daily Breakfast & Gourmet Dining
description:
Leave the rest of the world behind for the magic of Indonesia’s gorgeous Riau Islands with a tropical private pool villa stay at Banyan Tree Bintan. This breathtaking resort offers laidback luxury in abundance just a short ferry ride from Singapore. Surrounded by virgin rainforest and a private beach, this dreamy resort is the perfect place to hide away in luxury. Stay in a Balinese-style villa built into the hillside, accessible from the thatched-roof lobby by golf buggy. Indulge in signature dining experiences at three incredible resort restaurants, serving everything from modern European to Thai cuisine. Relax in style with two refreshing swimming pools and the blissful Banyan Tree Spa for traditional Balinese massages with homemade oils.

Just beyond the resort’s perimeter, keen golfers will delight in the Greg Norman-designed 18-hole Laguna Bintan Golf Club, boasting breathtaking ocean views from the green. Bintan's white-sand beaches, tropical rainforests, monkey-filled mangrove forests and sacred temples invite exploration in between lounging poolside with a cocktail in hand.
offer_address: Laguna Bintan Resort, Jalan Teluk Berembang, Sebong Lagoi, Tlk. Sebong, Kabupaten Bintan, Kepulauan Riau, 29155, Indonesia

title: Bintan Island Apartment Escape 40 Minutes from Singapore with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Dinner & Cocktails
description: Venture to where the lush Indonesian forest meets the sea with a relaxing retreat at beachfront beauty, Cassia Bintan - a 40-minute ferry trip from Singapore's bright lights. Sip on refreshing cocktails at Bintan Island's only beach club as you watch the tide roll in. Test your swing at the resort's own 18-hole golf course or the tennis courts, or explore the world beyond the shore with a snorkelling, canoeing, jetskiing or fishing adventure in the blue South China Sea waters. Experience decadence in the form of pampering with a rejuvenating treatment at Banyan Tree Spa Bintan (offsite) and stay nourished throughout the day with delicious meals and quick bites from Vista Cafe.
offer_address: Jalan Teluk Berembang, Laguna Bintan, Lagoi, Bintan Island 29155, Indonesia

title: Bintan Island Ocean-View Bliss with Private Beach
description:
Venture to a one-of-a-kind oasis, where lush rainforest terrain and stunning views of the South China Sea take centre stage, at Angsana Bintan - a peaceful oasis in Indonesia's Riau Islands archipelago, a short ferry ride from Singapore. 

Spend your days exploring Bintan's cultural heart in the island's largest town, Tanjung Pinang, or retreat to the comfort of the secluded resort, where a private beach with stunning white sands and towering coconut trees acts as the perfect backdrop to recharge. Make the most of the exquisite onsite facilities: slip into the expansive swimming pool, drop into the Marine Centre and book a variety of adventures, including canoeing, windsurfing, snorkelling, jet skiing and fishing. Get active and sweat it out at the gym or take it down a notch and visit Angsana Spa, where skilled therapists are on hand to pamper you. As for dining options, you’ll be spoiled for choice. Take a seat at Lotus Café for all-day local and international dining, swing by XANA Beach Club for a cocktail, or head to Veranda Lobby Lounge for small bites and refreshments.
offer_address: Jalan Teluk Berembang, Sebong Lagoi, Tlk. Sebong, Kabupaten Bintan, Kepulauan Riau Kabupaten Bintan 29155
